events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item was not what I expected and I want to request a refund for it.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning wanting their money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, please share details about the product and the reason you want to return it.
The order number is 123456789. The product doesn’t match the description on your website, so I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated the refund process for your order 123456789. You should receive the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for starting my refund. I appreciate your help with this matter.
The refund request has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting us.
